description: Tsukinose Vignette April, known as Vignette, is a very responsible devil. Just as http://anidb.net/ch83745 [Gabriel]`s personality doesn`t agree with her role as an angel, Vignette`s is similarly unfit to a devil. She is always looking after Gabriel, who lives in the same building as her and is incapable of ignoring people that are in trouble.
name: Tsukinose Vignette April
